entities.description: Lack of interest or pleasure in most activities, a common symptom of depression.
Significant changes in appetite or weight, indicating potential mental health issues.
Issues with sleep, including insomnia or excessive sleep, commonly associated with mental health disorders.
Feelings of restlessness or lethargy, observed by others, as a symptom of mental health concerns.
Persistent tiredness or low energy, nearly every day, indicating possible depression.
Feelings of worthlessness, experienced nearly every day, as a significant symptom of depression.

relationships.description: Relates adult depression to the symptom of losing interest or pleasure in most things.
Relates adult depression to the symptom of changes in appetite or weight.
Relates adult depression to the symptom of experiencing sleep problems.
Relates adult depression to the symptom of feeling restless or lethargic.
Relates adult depression to the symptom of feeling tired or having low energy nearly every day.
Relates adult depression to the symptom of experiencing feelings of worthlessness nearly every day.
